translations: 激怒；使气恼（acerbate 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: Of particular concern is runaway bank lending to questionable infrastructure and industrial projects that are driving up commodity prices and ex - acerbating power shortages.
sentences.translation: 尤其令人担心的是，银行向有问题的基础设施和工业项目提供贷款失去控制，加剧了原材料价格上涨和能源短缺的状况。
